description.en:
‚ÄúI‚Äôll come borrow more next week ‚ô•‚Äù

Chaeseong, a loan shark, has unfortunately gotten himself tangled up with a creepy man named Yoo-on. He‚Äôs a pushover client who repays even the most predatory interest without blinking an eye‚Äîbut those lecherous eyes of his are seriously annoying.

‚Ä¶Enough is enough. Looks like this bastard needs to be taught a lesson.

description.en: Half-vampire, half-werewolf Marlo undergoes a very special transformation when exposed to the full moon‚Äîhe becomes a she! Finally married to the handsome, womanizing vampire David, Marlo's figuring it all out. That is, until a rich werewolf and a rival vampire fall for the moonlight missus!

description.en:
‚ÄúI think I‚Äôve fallen for you‚Ä¶‚Äù 

A 4-page shorts collection of BL stories depicting such moments. Includes works of 29 popular and talented authors. Look forward to it.

#BL Pretend: A game on the internet where men pair up to form a couple, upload flirtatious pictures to SNS, and enjoy the reaction they get from girls. It‚Äôs basically pretend-play, but some of them are actually dating‚Ä¶ Among the players, Gorou, a gloomy guy with a strong desire for approval, is looking for a partner to participate in the popular 'BL Pretend' on SNS! One day, an intimidating classmate approaches Gorou and asks him to be his partner for the game-!?

Keiji Nishiono, 36, runs a small, unsuccessful detective agency with his only assistant, the beautiful-but-strict Eisei Takatoh. Laid-back and empathetic to a fault, Keiji is constantly being scolded by Eisei, who is much more of a realist. One day, they accept a case about relationship troubles and go undercover as a couple to infiltrate a gay bar...!! Their investigation goes well, but egged-on by the gay men around them, they end up kissing. After that incident, they start seeing each other as more than business partners...
A very rude but good looking banker named Ryo Masaki seeks the help of poor detective Keisuke Sanjo. This is the first client that he has seen in a very long time‚Ä¶ what could he need?
description.pl: Pewnego razu, niezwykle nieuprzejmy, ale bardzo przystojny pracownik banku, Masaki Ryo skonsultowa≈Ç siƒô w pewnej sprawie z detektywem Sanjou Keisuke. Masaki, kt√≥ry zosta≈Ç oszukany i zdradzony przez faceta, zapyta≈Ç Sanjo: ‚ÄûIle mam Ci zap≈Çaciƒá, ≈ºeby≈õ siƒô ze mnƒÖ przespa≈Ç?‚Äù. Jaka bƒôdzie odpowied≈∫ Sanjo? Pierwsza manga BL Monden Akiko, romantyczna komedia rozgrywajƒÖca siƒô miƒôdzy hetero-detektywem, a tsundere pracownikiem banku!

description.en:
Milky Way Village is a charming, rustic town where the Milky Way galaxy illuminates the night sky. At its heart stands Night Compass, a cozy doll shop run by Baek Young-ha and his family. While Young-ha is passionate about creating and repairing dolls, his skills aren‚Äôt as refined as his parents‚Äô. Still, he‚Äôs determined not to let that stop him from pursuing his dream of sharing the joy of handmade dolls with the world - starting with his own community. Welcome to the Milky Way High Doll Club, where Young-ha and his friends navigate the rough patches of youth, one stitch at a time!

---
- [Original Webtoon <Lezhin>](https://www.lezhin.com/ko/comic/galaxy_1)

description.en: Sugiki, a standard ballroom dancer, offers to teach ballroom dancing to Suzuki, a Latin american dancer, in exchange for Suzuki teaching him in return. Their names are similar, but their personalities are totally opposite, just like their dance. When the two meet, something's bound to happen!

Kotaro has always admired the life of the "honorable outlaw" that he's seen so often in the yakuza movies of his youth‚Ä¶ and it doesn‚Äôt hurt that he's set up to inherit his grandfather's role as the local yakuza boss! One day, after witnessing the quiet florist, Toraji, capture a purse-snatcher single-handedly, Kotaro declares him the ideal Big Brother he's always looked for in the syndicate. From that day on, Kotaro stalks Toraji at his flowershop, all the while falling in love. Toraji's dark past, including a criminal record from his affiliation with the yakuza, has hardened his heart against relationships‚Ä¶but will the ever-doting Kotaro help plant the seed of love to blossom once more?

description.en:
Tang Dong Bao was so close to becoming an immortal. Before he could receive an official certificate, he had to complete a task. Thanks to the guidance of his senior immortals, he accepted an amazing task! His objective was to travel to different worlds and save the target, Xiao Yi. However, in the first world, Dong Bao was directly killed by him! What exactly can I do to save you, my dear target?!  
This is the story of one man‚Äôs attempt at treating a psychopath.

description.en: The enemy has abused me thousands of times, but I treat the enemy like first love. After dying at Ji Chi's hands ninety-nine times, Si Xu was reborn again, and finally figured out that the best way to attack Ji Chi is to influence him with love?! In order to leave the realm of cultivating immortals and return home smoothly, Si Xu decided to bear the burden of humiliation and sacrifice himself with tears in his eyes... The effect is obvious; Ji Chi is very useful, and everyone in the Jingguangjie knows that Si Xu is a big lover. Si Xu: (Bitter) Returning from rebirth, it was me who was scheming?

When he was younger, Takeshi promised to come to the aid of a "cute girl" in his calligraphy class that he had a crush on. Since then he has never strayed from Mako's side. Mako sees Takeshi as "cute as a stupid dog". Add in third wheel friend Honda, along with many other typical plots for a school romance and you have a story.

Imagine a senpai you don't get along with. Then imagine having to work with that senpai and live in the same apartment! With no vacancies in the singles dorm, newbie cop Kaitou has no choice but to move in with his senpai from the koban, Himuro. While he's beautiful and excels at his job, Himuro has a mouth on him and he and Kaitou fight like cats and dogs. But then one morning: surprise! A sudden embrace and a kiss!

"Aries x Pisces"; "Taurus x Aquarius"; "Gemini x Sagittarius"; "Cancer x Capricorn"; "Leo x Virgo" and "Scorpio x Libra" ‚Äì the outcome of these six romances is only known by the stars! Catching a delinquent, criticizing a Junior, fighting couples, the attack of a meddlesome person and many other different types of couples. Accepting the personalities of the 12 Zodiacs!

Collection of 19 short stories.   
The collection contains stories of diverse authors. Everyone can find something for themselves in these unusual ¬´days¬ª.

**The collection consists of:**  
- Prologue by Moss & Old Xian

The cute and funny adventures of a boy and his best friend.  
  
Note: The story starts at chapter 42. The earlier chapters contain insert art of the characters by the author.

description.en:
‚ÄúWe follow an unspoken agreement not to look at each other‚Äôs face. After all, he‚Äôs nothing more than a conversation partner for me to unwind with in the restroom‚Ä¶ Once we leave these doors, we're nothing but strangers.‚Äù  
  
A BL about falling in love(?) in the company restroom.

The young Nathan due to a circumstance that occurred in his childhood: he became a depressed and antisocial boy, one day he meets Sherwin and a little more of his life begins to change, could Sherwin be the Nathan he wants so much?

Tine is a first-year college student and self-proclaimed playboy who has a gay admirer in his university named Green. To get Green to leave him alone, his friends convince him to make Sarawat, an attractive but introverted guitarist and soccer player, his fake boyfriend. After his first attempt to pursue Sarawat fails, Tine joins the music club, where Sarawat is a member. Eventually, Sarawat agrees to Tine's offer. The show then proceeds to follow the ups and downs of their "fake relationship" which eventually blossoms into a real relationship, but not without the usual problems of jealousy and insecurities that come with dating.

2gether is an adaptation of JittiRain's Phro Rao Khu Kan novel series.

One night, while the three Naruse brothers‚ÄîAkito and his two younger siblings‚Äîare stargazing at a quiet shrine during a Leonid meteor shower, something strange happens. A mysterious alien creature named Piroshki appears from the sky. Intrigued and bewildered, the brothers bring Piroshki home with them. However, one of the alien‚Äôs strange objects ends up inside their possession.
At well-known University 985, there's 320 dorm. Because the four people in the dormitory have different personalities but all look very handsome, they are known as 320F4. Here is their little story.

description.pt-br:
Gabriel sempre levou a vida na universidade com leveza - flertes ocasionais, festas e uma habilidade inata para transformar qualquer situa√ß√£o em vantagem. Enzo, por outro lado, √© mais reservado, equilibrando os estudos com a expectativa da sua m√£e e o medo de nunca realizar seu sonho de ser quadrinista. Quando seus caminhos se cruzam, o interesse √© imediato, mas transformar isso em um relacionamento √© outra hist√≥ria.

Entre desencontros, julgamentos alheios e os desafios de conciliar vida acad√™mica, fam√≠lia e sentimentos inesperados, 365 Dias Apaixonados acompanha um ano repleto de paix√£o, d√∫vidas e aprendizados. Afinal, estar junto n√£o √© s√≥ sobre gostar - √© sobre enfrentar o mundo lado a lado.

description.en: A personification drama about the internet, "Hey, aren't you a passerby? "

altTitles.ja-ro: Yonjuu Made ni Shitai Juu no Koto

description.en:
"I'd be down to sleep with you."

These past 10 years I haven't dated anyone and given up on love. Now it's three months until my 40th birthday.

Have a takoyaki party, eat a parfait, spend my birthday with a lover.
The handsome member of my team who's 10 years younger than me just had to find my secret list and now we're going to check it off together?

Making the list changed my life?! A love story between a handsome subordinate x his older superior.

Eiji and Koichi are such good friends their colleagues think they‚Äôre dating. Since being roommates in the same dormitory some 20 years ago, they‚Äôve gone through the same university, the same company, and living the married life under the same building. One day, they both find out that their wives want a divorce. While drunk and consoling each other, Eiji shares his troubles ‚Äúdown there‚Äù and it turns into a competition of who gets to make the other come first.
The interesting stories of 44 and 99 that takes place in alternate universes.

Kawanishi Wataru and Higashino Shuzou have known each other for 10 years. They both work at the same company, and they both hate each other, thinking the other is competition. One day, out of the blue, they find themselves in bed together‚Ä¶
